notes.title: Mathematics — Quick Study Notes
notes.content:
Limits and derivatives overview:
- Definition of limit
- Basic derivative rules
- Example problems with solutions

Remember: practice problem set 1.

notes.title: History — Quick Study Notes
notes.content:
World War II summary:
- Major causes and events
- Timeline of 1939-1945
- Key figures and consequences

Tip: focus on the main theatres of war.

notes.title: Chemistry — Quick Study Notes
notes.content:
Organic chemistry basics:
- Functional groups
- Reaction mechanisms (SN1, SN2)
- Example synthesis routes

Keep a list of reagents handy.

notes.title: Biology — Quick Study Notes
notes.content:
Cell structure and function:
- Membrane components
- Organelles and their roles
- Cellular respiration overview

Draw diagrams to memorise structures.

notes.title: Physics — Quick Study Notes
notes.content:
Newtonian mechanics essentials:
- Newton's laws
- Kinematics formulas
- Sample problem: projectile motion

Practice deriving motion equations.

tasks.title: Math Assignment 1

tasks.description: Complete problem set 1: limits and derivatives. Show full solutions.

tasks.description: Read and take notes on Chapter 4: applications of derivatives.

tasks.title: Biology Diagram Review
tasks.subject: Biology
tasks.description: Review cell organelle diagrams and label each part. Completed draft.

tasks.title: Physics Problem Set
tasks.subject: Physics
tasks.description: Solve projectile motion and kinematics questions; submit before deadline.
